title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Team-Based Online Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Equation Comprehension
context.additional_context: Most learners are non-degree job seekers aiming to strengthen practical math skills. Blended learning environment using video lectures, discussion boards, and collaboration tools (Google Workspace, etc.) within an LMS

learning_goals: Learners achieve a baseline mathematical problem-solving proficiency applicable to real-world scenarios with ≥80% accuracy.

Collaborate with 3-4 teammates using online tools (Google Docs/Notion) to complete a 2-week project-based assignment (data analysis/visualization), submit a 10-page final report, and achieve "excellent" ratings in four or more of five evaluation criteria (clarity, logic, creativity)
Improve constructive communication skills by providing peer feedback ≥2 times weekly on the LMS discussion board.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
